name: Last L!fe: Duel
description:
Two Gunmen enter the shooting range. They will start shooting each other to earn scores.

A 2 Player run 'n gun game where they are enemies.

Player 1 (Blue)

W Key- Jump Up

A Key- Move Left

S Key- Jump Down/Prone

D Key- Move Right

Space Key- Shoot

Player 2 (Red)

Up Key- Jump Up

Left Key- Move Left

Down Key- Jump Key/Prone

Right Key- Move Right

Num 0 Key- Shoot

Map Controls

I Key- Previous Map

O Key- Next Map

The Score increases whenever you kill an enemy.

After death, agents(characters) spawn at spawn point.

Agents cannot be killed in the spawn point.

Holding down the S Key/Down Key will continuously move you down the jump-thru platforms.

Proning allows you to dodge standing bullets, but slows down movement.
